mapper.select: SELECT d.DOCID, d.GROUPCODE, d.DOCCATEGORY, d.TITLE, d.CONTENT, c.CODENAME FROM DOCUMENTS d JOIN CODEDETAIL c ON d.GROUPCODE = c.GROUPCODE AND d.DOCCATEGORY = c.code WHERE DOCID = #{docId}

SELECT d.DOCID, c.CODENAME, d.TITLE, d.CREATEDAT, d.STATUS FROM DOCUMENTS d JOIN CODEDETAIL c ON d.GROUPCODE = c.GROUPCODE AND d.DOCCATEGORY = c.code
AND d.title LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY d.DOCID DESC OFFSET #{pageRequestDTO.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRequestDTO.size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DOCUMENTS d JOIN CODEDETAIL c ON d.GROUPCODE = c.GROUPCODE AND d.DOCCATEGORY = c.code
AND d.title LIKE '%' || #{pageRequestDTO.keyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENTS (GROUPCODE, DOCCATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (#{groupCode}, #{docCategory}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE DOCUMENTS SET GROUPCODE = 'DOC_TYPE', DOCCATEGORY = #{docCategory}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATEDAT = (SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul') WHERE DOCID = #{docId}
